slowmode.description: The slowmode cooldown for this channel in seconds (0 for none)

nsfw.description: True for NSFW channel, false otherwise

news.description: True for news channel, false otherwise

id.description: The ID of the channel. Used for identification purpose internally

role_permission_overrides.description: An array of role permission overrides

user_permission_overrides.description: An array of role permission overrides
